question: Hi,MedHelp is pleased to announce the opening of our new Ask a Doctor: Adult Diabetes forum. All questions here will receive a personal answer from Anita Ramsetty, M.D. , the Medical Director at the Endocrine Care Group.The forum is located athttp://www.medhelp.org/forums/show/161.Thanks and hope you'll swing by.MedHelp
title: New Ask a Doctor: Adult Diabetes forum
